title: Revenue of the leading telecommunications companies in Germany 2008 to 2018
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 4 lines namely Deutsche Telekom, Vodafone Germany, Telefónica Germany, and E-Plus group. The y axis represents Revenue in billion euros and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Telefónica Germany is gradually increasing, Deutsche Telekom, and E-Plus group are gradually decreasing, Vodafone Germany is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Revenue in billion euros in descending order is: 1. Deutsche Telekom, 2. Vodafone Germany, 3. Telefónica Germany, and lastly, 4. E-Plus group.
Throughout the period, Deutsche Telekom generally had the highest Revenue in billion euros relative to others with an average of 25.94, and it reached its maximum at 2008 with a value of 28.9.
After Deutsche Telekom, Vodafone Germany overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 9.9, peaking at 2015.
The botommost line, E-Plus group,  has a mean of 1.77, and peaked at 2012.
